rules_text:
When this artifact enters, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of artifacts you control. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, put twice X +1/+1 counters on it instead.
Retrofit {4}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It's a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
